Smart Home! The easiest way to control all the devices from your phone.
Switch Devices Easily switch devices by switching it ON/OFF.
Set Timer Set timer with just a click. Just mention the starting and ending time!
Sensor Control Switch Switch on this switch if you want the system to switch the devices based on the system sensors.
